title: Matisse & the Fauves
creator_credit: George Barford, Egons Tomsons and International Film Bureau Inc
brief_description: Documents the search of Henri Matisse and other painters for a greater intensity of colour based upon their belief that the impact of a painting comes from its coloured surface. Shows Matisse’s developing use of bold, simplified brushwork and brilliant unnatural colour.
creator_credit_for_label: George Barford, Egons Tomsons and International Film Bureau Inc
